message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A little extra to start since you'll be losing value each round.
I appreciate the gesture, Alice, but now it's my turn to propose a fair split.
It seems we have different ideas of fair, Bob. Let's see what happens next round.
How about this, Bob? It's still a slight advantage for me, but closer to even considering the time pressure.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I need a bit more to offset the decreasing value.
I understand the time pressure, Bob, but I'm willing to take a risk for a better outcome. Let's see what the next round brings.
Okay Bob, let's make this simple. An even split. Take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
